modules: Modules Organizational Behavior and Human Resource Management HR Analytics, Leadership and Culture Year 1 Evidence based organizational interventions Cognitive and Behavioral perspectives at workplace HR Administrative and Labor Laws Year 2 Practicum and Internship based courses Research methods, and manuscript writing
career: Career prospects Human Resource Manager: Will be responsible for various HR functions,  like job designing,  Recruitment,  Training and Development,  developing Policies in alignment with organizational goals, Compensation and Benefits. Organizational Development Consultant: Developing strategies to improve organizational effectiveness and performance.  Focusing on change management, team building etc. Talent Acquisition Specialist: This job position responsible for recruiting and hiring g employees. Also in conducting job analysis,  developing and executing recruitment strategies,  design and conduct interviews, finding the right candidate to fulfill the job needs. Employee Relations Specialist: Focus on building and maintaining positive relationships between employees and organization. Handle conflict resolution, employee grievance,  fair treatment of employees adhering to organizational policies.
